statements: DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 100 AND attendance_status = 'absent';
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE id = 1 AND employee_id = 100
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length < 7.5 OR finger_width > 3.2
DELETE FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 100 AND date = '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 123 AND hand_shape = 'oval';
DELETE FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND clock_out_time < '18:00:00';
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 101 AND hand_measurements > 5
DELETE FROM employee_info WHERE supervisor = 'John Doe' AND department = 'Engineering'
